name: Cosmic Glue
description: A shimmering adhesive that permanently bonds any two surfaces, no matter the material.

name: Universal Solvent
description: A rare liquid capable of breaking down any adhesive, including magical glues.

name: Small Tent
description: A compact canvas tent, just large enough for two people and their bedrolls, providing shelter from the elements.

name: Large Tent
description: A spacious, durable tent designed to house up to six people comfortably, with included bedrolls.

name: Mana Potion
description: A glowing vial that fully replenishes the drinker’s magical energy or mana reserves.

name: Health Potion
description: A ruby-red potion that restores the drinker’s health completely, ineffective on undead creatures.

name: Contingent Time Heal
description: A magical charm that rewinds the holder’s timeline by six seconds upon death, preventing fatal outcomes once.

name: Loaf of Bread
description: A hearty, rustic loaf of bread, sufficient to satisfy half a meal for one person.

name: Hunk of Cheese
description: A dense wedge of aged cheese, offering a savory, protein-rich snack.

name: Rations
description: A sealed package of dried meat, fruit, and hardtack, providing one day’s worth of sustenance.

name: Chunk of Meat
description: A generous serving of fresh, uncooked meat, ready for cooking or consumption.

name: Common Wine
description: A basic bottle of local wine, inexpensive yet sufficient to lift spirits.

name: Mug of Ale
description: A frothy mug of hearty ale, a favorite among tavern-goers.

name: Fine Wine
description: An exquisite bottle of rare vintage wine, highly prized by connoisseurs and nobles.

name: Weak Acid
description: A small vial of acid capable of corroding non-metallic substances over time.

name: Arrow
description: A standard wooden arrow tipped with iron, designed for use with longbows or shortbows.

name: Crossbow Bolt
description: A sturdy iron bolt crafted for crossbow use, delivering reliable piercing power.

name: Antitoxin
description: A precious vial containing a universal antidote that neutralizes most non-magical poisons.

name: Leather Backpack
description: A sturdy leather pack designed to comfortably carry a variety of gear and supplies.

name: Bedroll
description: A rolled-up blanket and pad, providing basic comfort and insulation while sleeping outdoors.

name: Common Clothes
description: Simple, rugged garments typically worn by peasants and travelers.

name: Fine Clothes
description: Elegant, well-tailored garments suitable for formal occasions or noble company.

name: Sprig of Mistletoe
description: A fresh or dried sprig of mistletoe, often used in druidic rituals or spellcasting.

name: Holy Water
description: A vial of consecrated water, highly effective against fiends and undead when used as a weapon or in rituals.

name: 10-Foot Pole
description: A long wooden pole, perfect for probing traps or measuring depth safely.

name: Sling Bullet
description: A smooth, rounded stone or metal bullet designed for use with a sling.

name: Strong Acid
description: A powerful corrosive substance capable of melting through nearly any non-magical material.

name: Bag of Holding
description: A magical bag that can hold far more than its outside dimensions suggest.

name: Portable Hole
description: A circular cloth that creates an extradimensional hole when spread on a surface.

name: Alchemy Jug
description: A magical jug capable of producing various liquids each day, such as water, acid, or mayonnaise.

name: Immovable Rod
description: A metal rod that can be fixed in space, defying gravity and supporting great weight.

name: Rope of Climbing
description: A 60-foot rope that animates to climb, knot, or fasten itself upon command.

name: Dust of Disappearance
description: A pinch of magical dust that renders the user and nearby creatures invisible for a short time.

name: Dust of Dryness
description: A pinch of dust that can absorb a large quantity of water, turning it into a marble-sized pellet.

name: Horn of Blasting
description: A magical horn that emits a destructive blast when blown, damaging creatures and structures.

name: Decanter of Endless Water
description: A magical container that produces fresh or salt water on command in various volumes.

name: Sending Stones
description: A pair of magical stones that allow communication over any distance once per day.

name: Sovereign Glue
description: An incredibly strong adhesive that can permanently bond objects together.

name: Universal Solvent
description: A magical liquid that dissolves sovereign glue and similar adhesives.

name: Quiver of Ehlonna
description: A magical quiver that can hold numerous arrows, bolts, and javelins without adding weight.

name: Instant Fortress
description: A small cube that expands into a large fortified tower when activated.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
description: A small statuette that transforms into a living creature to aid its owner.

name: Chime of Opening
description: A hollow metal rod that unlocks doors, chests, and other locks when struck.

name: Eversmoking Bottle
description: A bottle that, when opened, emits a thick, obscuring smoke until stopped.

name: Bead of Force
description: A small black sphere that explodes into a forceful blast, trapping creatures inside a resilient sphere.

name: Caltrops
description: A small bag of spiked metal pieces scattered on the ground to slow and injure pursuers.

name: Ball Bearings
description: A bag of tiny metal balls spread over an area to create difficult terrain and trip creatures.

name: Bear Trap
description: A heavy metal trap that snaps shut on creatures, restraining them.

name: Torch
description: A wooden stick wrapped in cloth, burns for 1 hour providing light.

name: Flint and Steel
description: A small kit used to start fires.

name: Hempen Rope (50 ft)
description: A 50-foot coil of tough hemp rope.

name: Silk Rope (50 ft)
description: A lighter and stronger 50-foot coil of silk rope.

name: Grappling Hook
description: A metal hook attached to a rope, useful for climbing or securing lines.

name: Waterskin
description: A leather pouch that holds water, enough for one day.

name: Salt Pouch
description: A small pouch of salt, useful for food preservation or rituals.

name: Herbal Kit
description: A pouch containing common medicinal herbs useful for basic first aid.

name: Blanket
description: A simple wool blanket, provides warmth during cold nights.

name: Candle
description: A small wax candle, burns for about an hour.

name: Soap
description: A bar of simple soap for washing.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A metal pot used for cooking over a fire.

name: Fishing Tackle
description: A small kit with hooks, lines, and bait for fishing.

name: Signal Whistle
description: A small whistle that can be heard over long distances.

name: Shovel
description: A sturdy metal shovel useful for digging or fortifications.

name: Miner's Pickaxe
description: A heavy tool for breaking rock or digging.

name: Hammer
description: A basic tool for driving nails or breaking small objects.

name: Pitons (10)
description: Iron spikes used in climbing to secure ropes or for anchoring.

name: Small Bell
description: A small metal bell, useful for setting alarms or signaling.

name: Steel Mirror
description: A polished steel mirror, useful for seeing around corners or signaling.

name: Piece of Chalk
description: A small piece of chalk, useful for marking walls, floors, or maps.

name: Needle and Thread
description: A small sewing kit for repairing torn clothes or gear.

name: Sealing Wax
description: A stick of wax used to seal letters or documents with a signet.

name: Iron Spikes (10)
description: Ten iron spikes useful for wedging doors, setting traps, or anchoring ropes.

name: Small Glass Mirror
description: A fragile glass mirror for personal grooming or peeking around corners.

name: Small Spoon
description: A simple metal spoon, useful for eating or cooking.

name: Wooden Bowl
description: A carved wooden bowl for holding food or water.

name: Ink Bottle
description: A small bottle of black ink used for writing.

name: Quill Pen
description: A feather quill used for writing with ink.

name: Parchment Sheet
description: A blank sheet of parchment for writing or drawing.

name: Small Bag of Sand
description: A small bag of sand, useful for extinguishing small fires or adding weight to objects.

name: Tin Whistle
description: A small metal whistle, useful for signaling or making music.

name: Small Net
description: A small net used for catching fish or small creatures.

name: Wooden Stakes (5)
description: Five sharpened wooden stakes, useful for setting traps or securing tents.

name: Clay Pot
description: A small clay pot, useful for carrying water, storing herbs, or holding small items.

name: Hand Bell
description: A small handheld bell, useful for signaling or attracting attention.

name: Charcoal Stick
description: A stick of charcoal, useful for marking surfaces or sketching maps.

name: Belladonna
description: A highly toxic plant with glossy black berries, commonly used in poisons and dark rituals.

name: Mandrake Root
description: A magical root resembling a tiny humanoid, famous for its scream when uprooted; used in sleep magic and potions.

name: Wolfsbane
description: A poisonous herb said to ward off werewolves and cursed creatures.

name: Nightshade
description: A deadly plant used in the creation of potent poisons and alchemical mixtures.

name: Kingsfoil (Athelas)
description: A rare healing herb known for soothing pain and treating minor wounds.

name: Faerie Fern
description: A shimmering fern often found in fae groves, used in enchantments and illusion magic.

name: Dragonwort
description: A spiny herb said to resist dragonfire; an ingredient in fire resistance potions.

name: Elfroot
description: A delicate herb cherished by elves for energy-restoring teas and tinctures.

name: Bloodgrass
description: A reddish grass that grows on old battlefields; used in blood magic rituals.

name: Moss of the Old Stone
description: A gray-green moss found only on ancient ruins; valued for divination spells.

name: Silverleaf
description: A silvery-leafed plant used in light magic and the crafting of enchanted items.

name: Glowroot
description: A faintly glowing root found in deep caves; provides natural light in the dark.

name: Bitterwort
description: A sharp-tasting herb used for cleansing toxins and crafting antidotes.

name: Whispering Reeds
description: Tall reeds that emit soft whispers in the wind; believed to carry the voices of spirits.

name: Emberflower
description: A fiery red blossom that never wilts and radiates gentle warmth; used in fire-based alchemy.

name: Ironbark Seed
description: A tough seed from the ironbark tree, known for producing nearly indestructible wood.

name: Ashcap Mushroom
description: A pale gray mushroom often found near dead trees; mildly toxic and used in brewing weak poisons.

name: Spirit Lily
description: A delicate white lily growing near sacred sites; enhances the effects of necromantic spells.

name: Ghostvine
description: A thin, translucent vine often draped over graveyards; used to communicate with spirits.

name: Sunblossom
description: A bright yellow flower that follows the sun; used in vitality potions and sunlight rituals.

name: Catmint
description: A common herb that delights felines and has mild calming effects when brewed.

name: Lunar Thistle
description: A rare thistle that only blooms under moonlight; amplifies moon-based magic.

name: Thunderleaf
description: A broad-leafed plant that crackles faintly with static; used in storm magic.

name: Tangleweed
description: A sticky vine that clings aggressively to anything it touches; useful in crafting snares and traps.

name: Snowdrop
description: A delicate white flower that blooms in the coldest winters, symbolizing hope and resilience.
